modName: Lucy - Standalone Quest Aware Custom Voiced Cyborg
summary: Lucy is the first mod to create a cyborg for Skyrim, Lucy is standalone and comes with 300+ lines of unique dialogue, she also has her own quest and a unique background story.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#9900ff][size=6][b][u]Lucy[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#9900ff][size=6][b][u]
[youtube]-iYzuc_gM9U[/youtube][/u][/b][/size][/color][/font][b][size=4]
[u][color=#d5a6bd]Small Description[/color][/u]
[/size][/b]Lucy is the first mod to create a cyborg for Skyrim, Lucy is standalone and comes with 300+ lines of unique dialogue, she also has her own quest and a unique background story, Lucy is an ongoing project.

[size=3]Race: [/size]Unknown
[size=3]Levels[/size] 10-80 (Essential)
[size=3]Class:[/size] Night blade (Mage)
[size=3]Spells:[/size] Ice storm, Lighting bolt, Oak flesh, Sparks.
[size=3]Perks:[/size] Light foot, Avoid Death, Stealth.
[size=3]Likes:[/size] The art of combat, joking around. Honey nut treats. Lucy likes dancing and having a good time. Lucy likes getting her adrenaline fix from time to time and enjoys the thrill of a good fight!
Location: Temple of Xrib (Sightless Pit, near Winterhold)

[b][size=4][color=#ff00ff]Features[/color]
[/size][/b]300+ lines of unique dialogue
Lucy is quest aware you can ask Lucy what's on her mind etc.
Lucy comments on various places she visits including all holds of Skyrim.
Lucy will dance in most of the Inns. 
Lucy is standalone and brings her own armor.
New Faction Order of the Night Blades (Cyborg Soldiers from the future) with their own custom armor.
Lucy brings along two new quests.
[size=4][b][color=#9900ff]
Quests [/color]
[/b][/size][size=3]1. Android 37 Must Die: 
[/size]Lucy broke free from the cyborg corporation, in which they had her in a cage, she went on a rampage and killed many scientists and guards. But there was one Android who was determined to stop her, Android 37, he pursued her for miles, and followed her into her master's lab. Lucy went inside looking for the portal, her master created. She had no choice but to activate the loophole in which her master forbid her and told her to never activate the portal. Android 37 got into a squabble with Lucy, and Lucy fought him and pushed him away and then activated the portal, Android 37 grabbed her foot and together they got sucked into the loophole arriving in Planet Nirn. Lucy got hurt as she traveled through the loophole and was unconscious Android 37 took her life source by force. Lucy needs your help in getting her life source back.
[size=3]
2. Order Of The Night Blades:
[/size]Android 37 called for reinforcements. The Cyborgs have entered the loophole and arrived in Skyrim, near the College of Winterhold. Lucy needs help in killing the cyborgs and sending them a message.

[youtube]3YxaaGgTQYM[/youtube]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4]Background Story [/size][/color]
Lucy wasn't always a Cyborg, she used to be a trainer in the art of combat she lived a regular lifestyle before the nuclear apocalypse together with her master. Her father used to work for the government and the center of intelligence, he held much power in society, but everything changed when his corrupt manager decided to eliminate him to gain more profit as resources were diminishing, everyone was desperate for more. Radiation levels made it barely a livable planet and most people lived in vaults, Lucy was heartbroken and instead of facing certain death by getting revenge, she fled to the mountains to live a peaceful life. But they sent cyborgs and soldiers to track her down as she knew too much information they finally tracked her down and beat her to a bloody pulp, and they told her she was nothing but dirt and she was the property of the Government. Lucy was filled with bitterness and anger as she found herself helpless. They locked her in a cage and put her too sleep, the government was plotting to kill her but instead they decided to turn her into a cyborg so she can do their dirty work. Lucy was the Government's little lab rat, just another machine added to their vast collection of Cyborgs. The Scientist's who experimented on her were control freaks and wanted Lucy to bend at their every command, the scientist's injected her with a special serum to make her stronger and to follow their commands. Lucy was one of the few who survived the serum, the serum backfired and Lucy only got stronger and found herself using a higher percentage of her brain. Lucy quickly went on a rampage and killed many cyborgs and scientist's she managed to escape and as she was being chased by the government she had no choice but to activate her master's portal to escape certain death. Lucy's master was a genius and was obsessed in creating a time machine. As Lucy activated her master's portal she entered into a loophole which brought her to a different Galaxy. 

[color=#9900ff][size=4]Inspiration[/size][/color]
[youtube]bMpHtAMZRek[/youtube]
 

[color=#ff00ff]Requirements[/color]
Skyrim.esm
Latest Update 1.9
(Apachii 1.5 is optional and required for the Exclusive version)

[color=#ff00ff]Compatibility[/color]
Compatible with AFT
Compatible with Sofia
Compatible with Inigo
Compatible with Vilja :)
Compatible with Wet & Cold
Compatible with spouse to custom home 
Compatible with head tracking
You shouldn't have a problem with most mods!For best results I recommend the AFT mod!
It's recommended to place Lucy at the bottom of your load order.
I have cleaned this mod with Tes5Edit and it also brings its own SEQ file, so you don't have to save and reload.
The hunting bow that automatically spawns in your Companions has been fixed in this mod.

[youtube]J6COD_MKuns[/youtube]

[color=#c27ba0]Questions?[/color]
[color=#c27ba0]I can't find Lucy, where did she go? it's ok Lucy tends to have a mind of her own sometimes.[/color]
open up the console ~ and press help Lucy! Or type in (player.placeatme 03000D62 :)

[color=#c27ba0]It's not lore friendly?[/color]
Buzz Off! read the above statement! Thank you! 

[color=#d5a6bd]Can I marry Lucy?[/color]
Not right now, you have no idea how much extra effort one must take for that option, but I'll most likely give players that option in the future.

[color=#d5a6bd]I thought I seen this mod up before "Sorina"
[/color]Many people sent me message on here and the nexus asking for Sorina and why I took her down. I nearly gave up on the project but then I decided to get to the bottom of it and I realized Sorina had a glitch with AFT, and I just had to make her compatible with AFT! The reason she had a glitch was because Sorina was one of the first mods I made and I made her with many mods installed which I learned a year ago it's a big no no! When modding one must always work on the CK with no mods installed only your esp and resources. I learned much now in the process. This is the new and improved version, in which comes with the actual cyborg eye as well with no glitches! And with unique dialogue and quests. :)

[color=#d5a6bd]Do I need anymore files?[/color]
No she is standalone, unless you want to put some make up and give her Apachii hair.

[youtube]Ab_ncqZ-6ZQ[/youtube]


[color=#9900ff]Credits [/color]
This mod is free and I don't expect any donations, it's all based on free ware, thanks to all who have supported my previous mods I appreciate it! :)
First of all I want to give credits and honors to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2527329/?]Elleh[/url] for her amazing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52667/?]Hedge Mage Armor[/url], thank you so much. You’re the best! ^.^
Secondly I want to give credit to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/874446/?]Edhildil[/url] for the amazing cyborg eye used in this mod. Thanks it makes Lucy really stand out from the other followers! :)
I also want to thank Heather for the voice acting! Thanks so much! I will mostly likely donate money to all who have helped me thanks again!
I also want to thank [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3100441/?]L0rd0fWar[/url] & CD Projekt's (Witcher 2 models) for the Order Of The knights Armor used in this mod, thank you so much :)
I want to thank this awesome community, the supporters, administrators, Robin, all of you who make it possible to have a great site such as this one.
I finally I want to thanks Bethesda for giving us such an open ended game such as Tes V Skyrim one of my favorite RPG games up to date, keep up the great work Bethesda! Been a diehard fan since day one! :D
author: Raynel07
